using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define vt vector

ll expopow(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==0)
		return 1;
	else
	{
		if(b&1)
		{
			return a*expopow(a,b-1);
		}
		else
		{
			ll temp = expopow(a, b>>1);
			return temp*temp;
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	ll n,k;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
		if(k==1)
			printf("%lld\n",n);
		else
		{
			ll ans=0;
			while(n>0)
			{
				ll r = n%k;
				ans += r;
				n/=k;
			}
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
	}
	system("pause");
	return 0;
}
